components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to T-Mobile US via Toll-Free Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in MMS delivery delays when sending messages to T-Mobile US via Toll-Free Numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: We experienced MMS delivery delays when sending messages to T-Mobile US via Toll-Free Numbers. Our engineers have rerouted the traffic in order to restore service to normal performance levels. We are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Airtel Network in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Airtel Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Airtel Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Airtel Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Airtel Network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Intermittent Failure of Calls to VirtualAgents through Google

incident_updates.body:
Engineers have identified the cause of call failures to VirtualAgent through Google and are working on a fix for agents created from 1PM PST February 28 through 5PM PST February 29. Agents created or updated after 5PM PST today, or created before 1PM PST on February 28 will work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Dialogflow

incident_updates.body:
Engineers have identified the cause of call failures to VirtualAgent through Google and are working on a fix for agents created from 1PM PST February 28 through 5PM PST February 29. Agents created or updated after 5PM PST today, or created before 1PM PST on February 28 will work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Dialogflow

incident_updates.body:
We are investigating intermittent failed calls to VirtualAgent through Google. Currently, new VirtualAgents (created after Feb. 28) would return errors. VirtualAgents created prior to the 28th would work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Dialogflow

incident_updates.body:
We are investigating intermittent failed calls to VirtualAgent through Google. Currently, new VirtualAgents (created after Feb. 28) would return errors. VirtualAgents created prior to the 28th would work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Dialogflow

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with calls to VirtualAgents through Google. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Client Web

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, March 2nd, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 March 2024 at 14:15 PST until 02 March 2024 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Puerto Rico SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Puerto Rico is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 March 2024 at 21:00 PST until 05 March 2024 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US and Puerto Rico handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 March 2024 at 21:00 PST until 04 March 2024 at 05:00 PST
04 March 2024 at 21:00 PST until 05 March 2024 at 05:00 PST
05 March 2024 at 15:00 PST until 05 March 2024 at 21:00 PST

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 25 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 01 March 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

25 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 26 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
26 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 27 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
27 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
